name: Radiant Hisuian Sneasler
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: Because of Sneasler’s virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

abilities.name: Poison Peak
abilities.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, put 2 more damage counters on your opponent’s Poisoned Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
